page.title: 07Employment in Ladock
page.content: The children of Ladock School found that the most popular job in Ladock is working on farms around the parish and the next popular is working for E.C.L.P. A few people work in shops in Truro and other towns. Steven Sheppard's dad works on a Diving Rig in Scotland. He is a diving instructor and he teaches about 50 people at one time. Tamsin Hannan's dad works at a fire station in London. About half the young people have jobs quite near to where they live. The rest are unemployed. 87% of mums work as well as being housewives. Many mums work or help on farms. Most grandads are retired or work quite near. Only a few grandads work away and very few grannies go out to work. {
